thread.title: Oscar Pistorius Released from Prison, Under House Arrest

title: Oscar Pistorius Released from Prison, Under House Arrest
text:
> Sports Oscar Pistorius Released from Prison, Under House Arrest Oscar Pistorius has been released from prison in South Africa and placed under house arrest. The former Olympic athlete was released after serving less than a year in prison for fatally shooting his g
